attributes.action: Give A level students more compensation for their exams in summer 2021
attributes.additional_details: There is a mass amount of people who are materially deprived. They rely on the schools resources to do well in exams. Virtual teaching does not help everyone. For this reason, the government needs to do more then just push back exams for 3 weeks.
attributes.background: Consider our predicted grades or reduce content. Do you think delaying exams for 3 weeks, when we lost 5 months of school is enough? Have you considered students unable to work at home due to their living conditions? Do you know how hard it is to understand A level content without direct teaching?
